definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: The position of the centromere and the behavior of chromosomes during meiosis also important.
sentences.chinese: 着絲粒的位置和染色體在減數分裂中的行爲也很重要。

sentences.english: Bivalent Describing any pair of homologous chromosomes when they pair up during MEIOSIS.
sentences.chinese: 在減數分裂中配對時的任意一對同源染色體。

sentences.english: Meiosis of microspore mother cells is synchronous or unsynchronous.
sentences.chinese: 小孢子母細胞減數分裂同步或不同步。

sentences.english: The megaspore mother cell meiosis to form a linear megaspore tetrad.
sentences.chinese: 大孢子母細胞減數分裂產生直線形大孢子四分體。

sentences.english: The nucleus in shrinking cytoplasm of microspore mother cell enters into telophase . 17.
sentences.chinese: 收縮的小孢子母細胞質中核進入減數分裂末期。

sentences.english: Successive cytokinesis in the megasporocyte follows meiosis and the megaspore tetrads are linear.
sentences.chinese: 大孢子母細胞減數分裂形成直線型四分體。

sentences.english: Apospory, aposporous The development of a gametophyte directly from a sporophyte without the occurrence of meiosis or spore formation.
sentences.chinese: 不經過減數分裂形成孢子，而直接形成配子體。

sentences.english: The result of this process is sperm cells ready to fuse with an egg.
sentences.chinese: 減數分裂的結果就是使精子細胞和卵細胞結合。

sentences.english: The cytokinesis of PMCs conforms to simultaneous type.
sentences.chinese: 小孢子母細胞減數分裂爲同時型。

sentences.english: Objective: To determine the effect of methylbenzene on meiosis of spermatocyte from mouse testis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討甲苯對小鼠精母細胞減數分裂的影響。

sentences.english: Prophase --- The first stage of cell division, during which the chromosomes become visible as discrete structures and subsequently thicken and shorten.
sentences.chinese: 細胞有絲分裂或減數分裂的第一個階段。

sentences.english: The nucleus in shrinking cytoplasm of microspore mother cell enters into diakinesis stage. 16.
sentences.chinese: 收縮的小孢子母細胞中核進入減數分裂終變期。

sentences.english: Synapsis before meiosis is restricted by PH genes.
sentences.chinese: PH基因制約減數分裂前染色體的聯會。

sentences.english: A second meiotic division, followed by development of the embryo, takes place if the egg is fertilized .
sentences.chinese: 如果卵受精，那麼第二次減數分裂伴隨胚胎的發育。

sentences.english: The roles of somatic meiosis-like reduction in the somatic embryogenesis and somaclonal variations were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 經體細胞類減數分裂產生的細胞都發生染色體重組。
